meanings.definition: The act of explaining or interpreting something.
meanings.sent1: Her explication of the math problem helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's explication of the story made it easier to follow.
meanings.sent3: His explication of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The explication of the mystery unraveled its secrets.
meanings.sent5: The explication of the painting brought out its hidden meanings.

meanings.definition: A detailed explanation or analysis of a text or work of art.
meanings.sent1: The art critic's explication of the painting revealed its true beauty.
meanings.sent2: I wrote an explication of the poem for my English class.
meanings.sent3: The explication of the movie plot left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her explication of the novel's themes was insightful.
meanings.sent5: The explication of the sculpture highlighted its intricate details.
